channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isn't as easy as it looks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta takes flight on a toy plane in 'Pups Save a High-Flying Hen', then in 'Pups Save a Sloth', Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey, and races the Paw Patrol to find it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger's reflector causes a bridge to burn in 'Pups vs. The Hum-Flector', then in 'Pups Save a Capybara', the Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Rubble & Crew get creative in 'The Crew Builds a Playground', and then in 'The Crew Fixes a Roof', the town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: When Zeg floats away on a kite, Blaze must team up with Zeg's three sisters to rescue him! Meg, Peg, and Egg save Zeg.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends learn about climbing from Grampy Rabbit at the climbing centre. Mummy Pig is worried about George when he gets scared of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George has a new hat and Mummy Pig is determined that George doesn't get it muddy when visiting Grandpa and Granny Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa takes Goldie the Goldfish for a visit to the vets and is surprised when she finds that there's a new road to be built over the building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig, but Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What's that sound? Is it a car alarm? Is it a fire engine? No, it's Baby Alexander. Babies cry a lot - but Alexander likes listening to Peppa. She knows about all sorts of things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is Granny and Grandpa's anniversary. Peppa and George go to Mr Fox's Shop to find them a present. Mr Fox's Shop sells everything.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: With a new baby on the way, Mummy and Daddy Pig realise they have run out of space at home! They decide to make their own home bigger with an extension.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Bull arrives with his team to start work on Peppa's house renovation. Peppa and family move into the caravan in the garden while the work is being completed.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Paw Patrol must reunite an ostrich family in 'Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends', and in 'Pups Save a Fashion Show', after a puffy shirt floats away with Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora is shrunk by Big Red Chicken's magic in 'Little Dora's Big Adventure', then in 'Bye Bye Balloon', Dora and Boots help get Benny's Balloon under control.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: More adventures with Daisy and her good friend Mr. Crocodile.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Liberty comes to visit just in time to save the Turbots in 'Liberty's Mountain Rescue', then in 'Pups Save a Flying Farmer Yumi', the wind takes Farmer Yumi and Garby on a wild flight.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia get lost at a play centre.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to find a new rocket that's perfect for him.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Tim tries to bend all the rules when Terri comes to babysit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Chase joins Rubble & Crew to help find a missing statue - and build a brand new Science Centre.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Daisy and Mr. Crocodile search for a lucky item to help them win a bike raffle in 'Lucky Croc', then in 'Sleepover Croc', Mr. Crocodile can't fall asleep at his first sleepover.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The family visit a museum. Peppa likes the room with things from Kings and Queens of long ago. George loves the dinosaur room.

channel.desc: Peppa and George learn some wonderful magic words. Nice things happen when you say please and thank you.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
